message: 昨天 mozilla 的 engineering manager @lxt 在 OSCON 分享的 minimum viable bureaucracy. chaordic++
story: Chia-liang Kao shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: Open source projects succeed with a minimum of process and management. How can you apply a chaordic open source approach to running your team?
name: Minimum Viable Bureaucracy // Speaker Deck
caption: speakerdeck.com
